TopicTitle: I just landed my first base on Duna

Articles.Content:
I now have a space tug that is in orbit around duna.  I used this to see if I can get there.  I will be converting this to a space station.  I also have a lot of unused Liquid only fuel canisters that I left in orbit around duna, so hopefully I can do something with them.  But im very excited!  I have 2 things in orbit around it, and hopefully I can use both of them!  OH!!  I also built 2 rovers there.  But they don't control very well.  I put a kerbal on it and they work great.  I think its a weight thing.  Low gravity and such.

I may send a supersized rover later.

Congrats!
It's a feeling that's hard to beat.

Congratulations!  Doing anything for the first time in KSP is always such a rush. 

Moving this mission report over to Mission Reports.
Sounds awesome! Could you post some pics?
Pic or it never happened : P
